title: DF Overlay Patch Notes
notes: === Version 1.0 Patch Notes (v1.0) ===
+ Initial release of EXP overlay
+ Added real-time EXP/hr tracking
+ Added DF Profiler scraping for level and EXP
+ Added draggable transparent overlay
+ Added AVG/hr and ETA calculations
+ Added basic EXP reset detection
=== Version 1.1 Patch Notes (v1.1) ===
+ Added full Settings window
+ Added color picker, font selection, and UI scaling
+ Added toggles for EXP, AVG, ETA, time, and graph
+ Added RAW / AVG3 / AVG5 EXP rate modes
+ Improved EXP smoothing and reset logic
+ Added debug console window
=== Version 1.2 Patch Notes (v1.2) ===
+ Added hunger detection via template matching
+ Added FINE and NOURISHED color states
+ Added blinking hunger alert indicator
+ Added hunger icon scaling option
+ Added EXP rate trend graph
+ Improved sampling performance and thread stability
=== Version 1.3 Patch Notes (v1.3) ===
+ Added scalable hunger icon
+ Added user-controlled icon size in Appearance tab
+ Improved image resizing and icon rendering
+ Added online version check and PID authorization
+ Added smooth graph rendering
+ Better UI scaling and font handling
+ Stability fixes and improved hunger sampling
=== Version 1.4 Patch Notes (v1.4) ===
+ Added custom PID login window with Remember PID option
+ Added remote kill switch functionality
+ Added online patch notes viewer (from website JSON)
+ Separated Next Level and Goal Level rows for cleaner layout
+ Minor UI improvements and bug fixes
=== Version 1.5 Patch Notes (v1.5) ===
+ Added global F1 hotkey so settings can open even when overlay is click-through
+ Merged click-through behavior into Lock Overlay Position for safer gameplay
+ Lock Overlay Position now fully prevents accidental overlay clicks in combat
+ Settings window temporarily disables click-through so UI remains clickable
+ Closing settings properly restores click-through based on lock state
+ Added working X button to settings with correct restore behavior
+ Apply button keeps settings window open instead of closing it
+ Removed old click-through toggle and related broken references
+ Fixed issue where overlay sometimes became stuck in non-clickable mode
+ Cleaned up state handling so overlay interaction never desyncs again
=== Version 1.6 Patch Notes (v1.6) ===
+ Added real-time digital clock display to overlay
+ Added 'Show Clock' toggle in Settings → General
+ Added persistent settings file (settings.json)
+ Overlay now restores text color, scale, goal level, font, hunger icon size, EXP mode, toggles, and clock visibility on launch
+ Overlay now restores last saved X/Y screen position
+ Added automatic settings saving when Apply is pressed
+ Added full auto-updater system with ZIP downloading, extraction, and auto-restart
+ Added 'Update Now' button in Settings → Info
+ Improved click-through behavior tied to 'Lock Overlay Position'
+ Fixed click-through disabling F1 until settings were opened
+ Improved settings window close handling
